Who We Are
Security Video for Smart Life
Shenzhen VStarcam Technology Co., Ltd, is a national High-Tech enterprise, integrates development, production, and sales, products mainly covering video surveillance, smart home, and intelligent security, has become the leading supplier of the rapid growing network intelligent hardware and system. VStarcam was founded in 2011, headquartered in Shenzhen. Products and solutions have been widely applied in more than 190 countries, has built a strong R&D, marketing and service network both domestically and worldwide. VStarcam aims to become the guardian of human security core strength. Yesterday, VStarcam create excellence! Today, VStarcam beyond dreams!
Purpose Vision: To become the most reliable and respected brand in smart home security. Mission: Create a safe, convenient and smart life for everyone. Core Values: Focus, Perfection, Enjoyment.
Brand Story Leading: Smart hardware solution provider 190 Countries: Product & solution covers more than 190 countries since 2014. Top 3 provider: IPC domestic market share.

Shenzhen VStarcam Technology Co., Ltd.,
Security and Investigations
About us
VStarcam Technology was founded in May 2011 and headquartered in Shenzhen, China. We are a professional network video solution provider as well as the leader of civilian video products.
The company covers an area of 7200 square meters' specialized production plants, with over 10 million's net assets and more than 1 million's VStarcam brand value !
Our R & D team including 40 software platform development engineers working on android, ISO, Windows and Linux software platform, and 10 hardware development & structural engineers.
VStrcam aims to provide innovative products, service and solutions in security area to meet different customers' demands.
Our products including IP network cameras and Baby monitors. With more than 20 different designs and types, can meet different scenario requirements. Software including browser view software, PC client software, Smartphone software, and platform software, allow users can view and manage camera at anywhere anytime.
Our products has been sold to more than 70 countries and regions, and has been applied in different area, baby monitoring, shop management, warehouse, supermarket surveillance, company and factory monitoring ect. And are widely praised by customers from all over the world for our easy to use, user-friendly features , personalized design and diversified solutions.

Exhibition review 〡VStarcam 2021 Global Consumer Electronics (Guangzhou) Expo ended perfectly
date:
2021-12-21
category:
News
On December 12, 2021, the first GCE Global Consumer Electronics (Guangzhou) Expo ended successfully at the China Import and Export Fair.
Shenzhen VStarcam Technology Co., Ltd. has been developing for 10 years since 2011, and has been committed to providing the latest and fastest security information, technical exchanges, market activities, and engineering applications for domestic and foreign security video surveillance and intelligent HD surveillance. And other services, it has formed a mature production, sales, and maintenance full-service operation mode. It has rich experience in the security industry and enjoys a high degree of authority and popularity.
With the rapid development of new technologies such as AI, Cloud computing, and biometrics, security is no longer just a silent monitoring of the screen, but an upgrade from “visible” to “clearly seen from a distance” and “remote real-time Two-way talk”. And it also breaks traditional security image and diversify intelligent expression.
Our teams explains the charm of the product’s characteristics, how to efficiently solve users’ problem of guarding their loved ones, experiencing new technologies on-site, such as remote real-time Two-way talk, zoomed in to view details, outdoor 4G solar care without electricity and internet, etc. in exhibition area.
At the GCE exhibition, VStarcam has ingeniously presented popular audio and video electronic products such as smart HD IP cameras, portable battery cameras, 4G solar surveillance cameras, smart homes, etc., and a close touch of the safest, most convenient, and smartest “Black Technology” in the mobile Internet era. We have successfully solved user’s problem of monitoring home, and we will serve our users with all our hearts.
Shenzhen VStarcam Technology Co., Ltd. has demonstrated its superior strength to domestic enterprises, and also provides multinational security companies with opportunities to enter the Chinese and Southeast Asian markets, helping to strengthen the new development pattern of domestic and international dual cycles.
Portable 4G card wireless battery camera, free of network and power, long standby for 2 years (data from VStarcam Labs), Waterproof & dustproof, freely arranged, support Cloud Storage, video data encryption can not be taken away, cannot be broken . 1920*1080P takes you to experience the super sense of science and technology. You can watch videos in multiple terminals at the same time without lag, share affection with family and caringly guard the areas that children, the elderly, pets, etc. want to guard.
Because the COVID – 19 epidemic is still raging around the world, it has severely affected all companies around the world, including companies in the security industry. The most significant changes in consumer market demand and supply chains have occurred. Facing this kind of challenge, VStarcam employees use innovative technology and product solutions to meet the different needs of the market, and maintain close cooperation with global partners to achieve sustainable development.
With the blessing of emerging technologies, VStarcam smart IP cameras are constantly breaking the circle, concentrating sincerity, exploring the characteristics of the eye of surveillance cameras skills, contributing a force to the acceleration of the security track upgrade, and also for security at home and abroad. Monitoring the development of the consumer market provides new opportunities to welcome and serve the future.
